rule-catalog.templates:
When ${button} is pressed then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${button} is pressed then toggle state of ${switch}.
When ${button} is pressed then open or close ${vent}.
When ${button} is pressed then run ${scene}.
When ${a person or device} is absent then lock ${door}.
Run the ${scene} scene when ${a person or device} departs.
Run the ${scene} scene when ${a person or device} arrives home.
Run the ${scene} scene when everyone leaves home.
Run the ${scene} scene when someone arrives to an empty house.
When there is no activity detected by ${device} for ${duration}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When no motion is detected by ${motion} ${for awhile}, turn ${switch} ${on or off}.
When ${contact} is opened then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${door} is ${opened or closed}, then run ${scene}.
When ${person or device} is missing from home for ${duration}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} is open for ${duration}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then set ${therm} to ${level}.
When the ${motion_device} detects motion, then set ${vent_device} to ${level}% open.
When there is no activity detected by ${motion_device} for ${duration}, then close ${vent_device}.
When ${a person or device} arrives, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${a person or device} leaves, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} is opened, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} is opened, then send ${person} a message via ${method} only if they are in QA
When ${device} is unlocked, disarm the security alarm.
When the security alarm is set to ${state}, then ${control} the ${garage_door}.
When the security alarm is set to ${mode}, then ${control} ${light} ${for awhile}.
When the security alarm changes to ${state}, then switch ${on_or_off} ${light} ${for awhile}.
When a ${alarm} is triggered, turn ${switch} ${on or off} ${for awhile}.
When the security alarm triggers, then run ${scene}.
When carbon monoxide is detected, then unlock the ${lock}.
When ${person or device} is gone for ${duration}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When smoke is detected, then unlock the ${lock}.
When smoke or carbon monoxide are detected, turn ${light} ${on} ${for awhile}.
When smoke or carbon monoxide are detected, then run ${scene}.
When ${device} has been on for ${duration}, then turn it off.
When ${person or device} is missing from home for ${duration}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${person or device} returns home, then unlock ${doorlock}.
When ${tilt} changes to ${state} then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${garage door} is set to ${opened or closed} ${for awhile}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
permission
When ${garage door} is ${opened or closed}, then turn ${switch} ${on or off} ${for awhile}.
When ${garage door} is ${opened or closed}, then run ${scene}.
When the ${door} is set to ${state}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
permission
When the security alarm is turned on but a lock is NOT locked then lock lock and send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When the security alarm is turned on but a lock is NOT locked then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${door lock} is ${locked or unlocked}, then turn ${switch} ${on} ${for awhile}.
When ${lock} is ${locked or unlocked} then ${open or close} ${garage door}.
When ${door lock} is ${locked or unlocked}, then run ${scene}.
When ${waterheater} has ${level}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} has been ${state} for ${duration}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${leakh2o} reports a leak, then turn off ${valve}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When motion detected by ${device}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When the security alarm is set to ${mode}, then ${control} the ${lock}.
When ${leakh2o} reports a leak, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When the security alarm is set to ${mode}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} is turned on or off, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${contact} is ${state} then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
permission
When the ${motion} detects motion, then turn the ${switch} to ${state} ${for awhile}.
When the ${motion} detects motion, then turn the ${dimmer} to ${value}.
When someone turns the ${thermostat} on and any door or window sensor is open send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${door} is unlocked, turn ${switch} on.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to On.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to Off.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to Partial.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, play a chime on the hub.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to On.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to Off.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to Partial.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, play a chime on the hub.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, set the alarm to On.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, set the alarm to Off.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, set the alarm to Partial.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, play a chime on the hub.
Pressing ${care pendent}, will trigger a Care Alarm on the Premium Plan and a Panic Alarm on the Basic Plan.
When ${button} is pressed, raise a panic alarm.
`
When ${button} is pressed, chime the hub.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, raise a panic alarm.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, raise a panic alarm.
When the ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, raise a panic alarm.
When ${button} on ${smart fob} is pressed then toggle state of ${switch}.
When ${button} on ${smart fob} is pressed then toggle state of ${switch}.
When ${key fob} ${button} is pressed then toggle state of ${switch}.
When ${button} is pressed, start record video from ${camera} for ${duration}.
When ${doorlock} is ${state}, start record video from ${camera} for ${duration}.
When ${motion sensor} detects motion, start record video from ${camera} for ${duration}.
When a security alarm is triggered, start recording from ${camera} for ${duration}.
Turn ${on or off} ${light} ${for awhile} when ${contact} is ${opened or closed}.
When ${device} temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then set ${vent} to ${level}.
When ${device} temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then turn ${switch} ${on or off} ${for awhile}.
When ${device} temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then set ${fan} to ${speed} ${for awhile}.
When ${device} electricity usage goes ${above or below} ${value} watts, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device} is locked, arm ${on or partial} the security alarm.
When the security alarm is set to ${mode}, then run ${scene}.
When ${device} is opened, start record video from ${camera} for ${duration}.
When ${button} is pressed, then ${control} ${garage door}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, then ${control} ${garage door}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, then ${control} ${garage door}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, then ${control} ${garage door}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, then run ${scene}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, then run ${scene}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, then run ${scene}.
When ${device}'s humidity goes ${above or below} ${value}%, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.
When ${device}'s humidity goes ${above or below} ${value}%, then turn ${switch} ${on or off} ${for awhile}.
When a pet enters or leaves through ${pet door}, then lock it ${for awhile}.
When ${button} is pressed, then ${open or close} ${blind or shade}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${1st gen key fob}, then ${open or close} ${blind or shade}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, then ${open or close} ${blind or shade}.
When ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, then ${open or close} ${blind or shade}.
When ${door lock} is ${locked or unlocked}, then set ${blind or shade} to ${open or close}.
When ${device}'s temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then set ${blind or shade} to ${open or close}.
